author: Roger Kolman
text: The city has been asked to sponsor several federal grants which will be passed on to local non-profit agencies.  Does anyone have a good agreement that they use to pass on to the sub-recipients the burden of complying with the federal requirements that go along with the grant?
title: Subrecipient agreements
